short_summary: GREEN PUBLIC PROCUREMENT TOOL FOR FEDERAL ASSETS
description: NPP Template/Gabarit APM. All responses must be submitted by July 1st, 2023 by 14:00 EST. The full ACAN document and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile.
full_summary:
**Green Public Procurement Tool for Federal Assets**
=====================================================

**Tender Reference:** WS4058865275

**Publication Date:** June 17, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 8, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** July 7, 2024

**Purpose:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the Green Public Procurement Tool for Federal Assets. This procurement opportunity utilizes the SAP Ariba platform.

**Procurement Category:** Service Contract (SRV)

**Limited Tendering Reason:** Exclusive Rights

**Trade Agreements:**
The following trade agreements apply:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
* Contracting Authority: SPAC/PSPC
* Contact Name: Hansen, Cendrella
* Email: [cendrella.hansen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cendrella.hansen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Submission Instructions:**
Please submit responses to the Contracting Authority via email by the specified deadline. For technical support with SAP Ariba, please contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk agents.

**Note:** This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN). Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the notice and submit their responses to the Contracting Authority before the specified deadline. Failure to submit a response by the deadline will prevent the supplier from being considered for the contract. [^1]

[^1]: This is an Advance Contract Award Notice, which means that the contract award has already been made. The notice is being posted to ensure transparency in the contracting process. Suppliers must still submit their responses to the Contracting Authority by the specified
